title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – lightweight, extensible framework to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama – chat, generate, pull, push, and list local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for Ollama – chat, embed, pull, and manage models with native async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and chat model for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama – markdown, code highlighting, multi-chat, model manager.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for Ollama – keyboard-driven chat, syntax highlighting, conversation history stored locally.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama – generate, chat, pull, and list models with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma – ingest PDFs, embed with Ollama, and chat over documents locally.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node affinity and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama – reproducible builds and declarative model management on NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger pipeline module that spins up Ollama in a container for CI-based LLM testing and prompt regression checks.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 SDK and CLI for Ollama – strongly-typed chat, embeddings, and model management with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir client for Ollama – GenServer-based chat and embeddings with Telemetry and OTP supervision trees.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for production RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode – @ mention Ollama in channels or DM for private, local LLM answers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with notes” sidebar powered by local Ollama models and vector search.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama for scalable, autoscaling local LLM microservices with GPU scheduling.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Official registry of curated Ollama Modelfiles – Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, and community contributions.
